column1: The Pit Room////If you're doing for dinner
column2: especially on a Friday or Saturday night you may want to try parking on a close by side street and taking a short walk there
column3: instead of hoping to find a parking spot. They have their own lot on the side and it seems relatively large
column4: probably would take 20 cars or so
column5: but it was completely full when we went on Friday around 530 pm. There are a lot of side streets so like I said
column6: may want to give that a try. Will definitely be back next time I'm craving tons of meat and BBQ.
